Name: granule_gid
Description: Common to granules of same type

Name: obs_id
Description: Associates granules derived from the same data

Name: dataproduct_type
Description: Organization of the data product, from enumerated list

Name: processing_level
Description: Dataset-related encoding, or simplified CODMAC calibration level

Name: target_name
Description: Standard IAU name of target (must match target_class), case sensitive.

Name: target_class
Description: Type of target, from enumerated list

Name: time_min
Description: Start time (in JD). UTC measured at time_origin location (default is observer's frame)

Name: time_max
Description: Stop time (in JD). UTC measured at time_origin location (default is observer's frame)

Name: c1min
Description: Min of first coordinate, depends on the frame.

Name: c1max
Description: Max of first coordinate, depends on the frame

Name: c2min
Description: Min of second coordinate, depends on the frame.

Name: c2max
Description: Max of second coordinate, depends on the frame

Name: s_region
Description: ObsCore-like footprint in 2D (if spatial_frame_type = celestial or body)

Name: spatial_frame_type
Description: Flavor of coordinate system, defines the nature of coordinates. From enumerated list. Use "none" if undefined.

Name: instrument_host_name
Description: Standard name of the observatory or spacecraft

Name: creation_date
Description: Date of first entry of this granule

Name: release_date
Description: Start of public access period (set to creation_date if no proprietary period)

Name: access_url
Description: URL of the data file, case sensitive (additional files may be linked through datalink_url). Can point to a script. If present, next 2 parameters must also be present.

Name: access_format
Description: RFC 2045 media type (mime), required to be all-lower case

Name: access_estsize
Description: Estimate file size in kbyte (with this spelling)

Name: access_md5
Description: MD5 Hash for the file when available (real file, not script)

Name: thumbnail_url
Description: URL of a thumbnail image with predefined size (png  200 pix, for use in a client only)

Name: file_name
Description: Name of the data file only, case sensitive

Name: datalink_url
Description: Provides links to files or services on the server

Name: bib_reference
Description: Bibcode or doi preferred; can be a URL or anything else. Refers to the granule

Name: processing_level_desc
Description: Describes specificities of the processing level

Name: internal_reference
Description: Related granule_uid(s) in the current service

Name: external_link
Description: Web page providing more details on the granule.

Name: species
Description: Identifies a chemical species, case sensitive

Name: filter
Description: Identifies filter in use, typically for images

Name: alt_target_name
Description: Provides alternative target name(s). Can be a hash list

Name: target_region
Description: Type of region or feature of interest

Name: feature_name
Description: Secondary name (e.g., standard name of a region of interest)

Name: coverage
Description: Introduces an ascii (ST)MOC (2D footprint, possibly including time, if spatial_frame_type = celestial or body)

Name: spatial_coordinate_description
Description: ID of specific coordinate system and version / properties

Name: time_refposition
Description: Defines where the time is measured (e.g., ground vs spacecraft). Default is observer's frame.

Name: time_scale
Description: Always UTC in data services - from enumerated list

Name: solar_longitude_min
Description: Min Solar longitude Ls (location on orbit / season)

Name: solar_longitude_max
Description: Max Solar longitude Ls (location on orbit / season)

Name: local_time_min
Description: Min local time at observed region

Name: local_time_max
Description: Max local time at observed region

Name: target_time_min
Description: Min observing time in target frame

Name: target_time_max
Description: Max observing time in target frame

Name: subobserver_longitude_min
Description: Minimum sub-observer point longitude (sub-Earth for ground based observations)

Name: subobserver_longitude_max
Description: Maximum sub-observer point longitude (sub-Earth for ground based observations)

Name: subobserver_latitude_min
Description: Minimum sub-observer point latitude (sub-Earth for ground based observations)

Name: subobserver_latitude_max
Description: Maximum sub-observer point latitude (sub-Earth for ground based observations)

Name: radial_distance_min
Description: Min distance from observed area to body center

Name: radial_distance_max
Description: Max distance from observed area to body center

Name: altitude_fromshape_min
Description: Min altitude of observed area above shape model / DTM

Name: altitude_fromshape_max
Description: Max altitude of observed area above shape model / DTM

Name: acquisition_id
Description: ID of the data file/acquisition in the original archive

Name: proposal_target_name
Description: target name as in proposal title

Name: north_pole_position
Description: North pole (of target) position angle with respect to celestial north pole

Name: platesc
Description: pixel angular size or platescale (on sky only)

Name: orientation
Description: Position angle of image y axis (on sky only)

Name: measurement_unit
Description: Physical unit, same as Bunit in fits

Name: observer_location
Description: Broad location of the observer or telescope

Name: original_publisher
Description: Refers to the source of the data, e.g.,  in compilations of experimental data

Name: diameter
Description: Target diameter, or equivalent diameter for binary objects

Name: magnitude
Description: Absolute magnitude. For small bodies, from HG magnitude system

Name: dynamical_class
Description: Class of small body, from enumerated list

Name: dynamical_type
Description: Subdivision of the class, from enumerated list

Name: map_projection
Description: ID from enumerated list, or string with parameters (referring to a standard)

Name: pixelscale_min
Description: Min pixel size on a surface

Name: pixelscale_max
Description: Max pixel size on a surface

Name: producer_name
Description: Data producer name, especially in compilations of experimental data

Name: producer_institute
Description: Data producer institute, e.g., in compilations of experimental data

Name: sample_id
Description: Provides a local ID in an existing catalogue

Name: sample_classification
Description: Information related to class, sub-class, species… as hash list

Name: sample_desc
Description: Describes the sample, its origin, and possible preparation. Can be a hash list

Name: species_inchikey
Description: Fixed length string identifying the species. Can be a hash list

Name: measurement_atmosphere
Description: Describes experimental conditions. "vacuum" for measurements under vacuum.

Name: setup_desc
Description: Describes the experimental setup. Can be a hash list

Name: data_calibration_desc
Description: Provides information on post-processing. Can be a hash list

Name: geometry_type
Description: Type of observation, from enumerated list. Can be a hash list

Name: spectrum_type
Description: Type of spectral observation, from enumerated list TBD. Can be a hash list

Name: event_type
Description: Type of event from enumerated list
